title: Blockmap Editor Tools Extras
description: Provides advanced tools using the Scriptable Tools Framework to create 3D tile/block-based environments. The full version of Blockmap Editor Tools.
longDescription:
Provides basic tools using the Scriptable Tools Framework to create 3D tile/block-based environments of varying sizes, with the potential to handle large Blockmaps (25,000+ blocks) using HISMs. To access all tools, navigate to the Scriptable Tools Mode in the Editor Mode Dropdown Menu.


Features:

  • Create Custom Block Types (just create a new Blueprint that derives from BlockData) for different Meshes.
  • (New) "Animate" Blockmaps by including multiple meshes in each custom BlockData Blueprint - the meshes will cycle either randomly or sequentially at runtime (based on settings) when used in a Blockmap actor.

Placement Tools: 

  • Block Draw Tool - Simple drawing functionality for placing blocks of the selected type with different brush sizes.
  • Block Fill Tool - Fill by dragging from one point to another, placing every block of the selected type in that region.
  • Block Extrude Tool - Extrude a selected face by placing blocks of the selected type one layer "outward" from the surface of an existing structure.

Block Group Tools:

  • (New) Group Open Tool - Open an existing BlockGroup asset in the viewport as a new Blockmap actor.
  • (New) Group Place Tool - Place an existing BlockGroup asset in an existing Blockmap actor.
  • (New) Group Save Tool - Overwrite an existing BlockGroup asset with an existing Blockmap actor.

Map Tools:

  • Add Blockmap Tool - Single-click tool that creates a new Blockmap Actor (class ABlockmap) which can be referenced in the settings for each tool to edit the map.
  • (New) Finish Blockmap Tool - "Finalize" an existing Blockmap actor for use without the plugin enabled. Removes all runtime functionality (i.e. block animation).
  • (New) Import Blockmap Tool - Convert a generic actor which was "finalized" using the Finish Tool into a functional Blockmap actor.


Additional features:

  • (New) Custom Block Rotation in Placement Tools.
  • (New) Block Palettes (Draw, Fill, Extrude): List of BlockData blueprints that can quickly and easily be enabled and disabled when drawing with placement tools; with multiple block types enabled, each placement tool will randomize every block placed between the enabled block types.


Dependencies:

  • Scriptable Tools Editor Mode (Epic Games)
  • Scriptable Tools Framework (Epic Games)
technicalDetails:
Dependencies:

  • Scriptable Tools Editor Mode (Epic Games)
  • Scriptable Tools Framework (Epic Games)


Features:

  • Create Custom BlockData Blueprints
  • Create Custom BlockGroup Blueprints
  • Place various block types easily using the editor tools (in Scriptable Tools Editor Mode)

Placement Tools: 

  • Block Draw Tool
  •  Block Fill Tool
  •  Block Extrude Tool

Block Group Tools:

  • Group Open Tool
  • Group Place Tool
  • Group Save Tool

Map Tools:

  • Add Blockmap Tool
  • Finish Blockmap Tool
  • Import Blockmap Tool


Code Modules:

  •  BlockmapEditorTools (Editor Module)
  • BlockmapRuntimeAPI (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 2 (1 Default Block Blueprint and 1 Default BlockGroup Blueprint)

Number of C++ Classes: 26 (28 header files; 28 cpp files)

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms:

Windows

Documentation:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1RFMCBjzvq1wCgP2qPg7Yv20Gvvsrj5Oce7l53PYEMew/edit?usp=sharing

Example Project: (None)

Important/Additional Notes:

It is recommended to make sure the active Blockmap actor is not selected while using the placement tools, as this may decrease performance considerably.

Also make sure to use the Map Finish Tool on any Blockmap actors if you intend to remove the plugin to avoid actor errors.
